data.name: Galactic Junk League: Cyberpunk Captain Pack
data.detailed_description:
New era is upon us. And new era always brings new perks! Step up your game and increase your chances in arenas with The Captain Pack. Along with 15 Space Whiskys and 30 days of Pilot License, the new rookie ship 'Orchid' will be your ticket out of the early battles into the real fights! Also, 17 premium Cyberpunk blocks and 600 Space Credits will get you everything you need to build the ultimate Cyberpunk ship.

The Captain pack includes:

  • DLC exclusive Cyberpunk rookie ship ‘Orchid’
  • 17 premium blocks from the Cyberpunk building block set
  • 15x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 30 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 600 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Captain Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
